unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post about Mental Health Apps:
normalised: Hey everyone! So, I have been thinking a lot about mental well-being lately, especially with the hustle and bustle of life in a city like Mumbai. Are any of you using mental health apps? I am genuinely curious to know what your experiences have been.

I have seen ads for a bunch - some promising meditation, others focusing on sleep, and even some offering online therapy sessions with Doctor Sharma's team from A I I M S, Delhi (or at least claiming to!). It is hard to know which ones are actually helpful and not just a waste of time (and, you know, data!).

Something light, you know, not requiring a commitment of, say, ten hours a week.
